docs.title: product(a, b)
docs.text:
Calculate the product of two integers.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default a int

first argument

required b int

second argument

required

Returns:

Name Type Description int int

product of two arguments

Source code in draft/utils.py 
def product(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    """Calculate the product of two integers.

    Args:
        a (int): first argument
        b (int): second argument

    Returns:
        int: product of two arguments
    """
    return a * b

docs.title: sum(a, b)
docs.text:
Calculate the sum of two integers.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default a int

first argument

required b int

second argument

required

Returns:

Name Type Description int int

sum of two arguments

Source code in draft/utils.py 
def sum(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    """Calculate the sum of two integers.

    Args:
        a (int): first argument
        b (int): second argument

    Returns:
        int: sum of two arguments
    """
    return a + b
